PageWidgetPortable.Title: Itens cancelados na aquisição
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_LC_AQUISICAOITENS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS=2 AND A.REQUISICAOITEM IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM LC_REQUISICAOITENS WHERE REQUISICAO=@RASTRO(LC_REQUISICOES)) AND (A.NUMEROREQUISICAO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1801_at3659_hs60987fe0.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Ocorrências nos ítens
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_PD_STATUS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.HANDLE IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM PD_STATUS WHERE HANDLETABELAORIGEM IN (SELECT B.HANDLE FROM Z_TABELAS B WHERE B.NOME = 'LC_REQUISICAOITENS') AND HANDLEREGISTROORIGEM IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM LC_REQUISICAOITENS WHERE REQUISICAO= @RASTRO(LC_REQUISICOES) ) AND DATAINCLUSAO >= (SELECT DATA FROM LC_REQUISICOES WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(LC_REQUISICOES) )))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1951_at2571_hsf4d5fc5.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Termo de referência
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_LC_TR.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.HANDLE IN (SELECT TERMOREFERENCIA FROM LC_REQUISICOES WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(LC_REQUISICOES)))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t5780_at8353_hsc8de2338.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
